title: Execution Layer Meeting 153
body:
### Meeting Info
* [January 19, 2023, 14:00-15:30 UTC](https://savvytime.com/converter/utc-to-germany-berlin-united-kingdom-london-ny-new-york-city-ca-san-francisco-china-shanghai-japan-tokyo-australia-sydney/jan-19-2023/2pm)
* Youtube Stream: https://youtu.be/hVeMHoUUZ30
    * **Note: calls are now under the [@EthereumProtocol Youtube Channel](https://www.youtube.com/@EthereumProtocol/)** 
* Zoom: shared on `#allcoredevs` Discord channel shortly before the call 
* [Ethereum Protocol Calls Calendar subscription](https://calendar.google.com/calendar/u/0?cid=Y191cGFvZm9uZzhtZ3JtcmtlZ243aWM3aGs1c0Bncm91cC5jYWxlbmRhci5nb29nbGUuY29t)

### Agenda

* [Shanghai Updates](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/450#issuecomment-1242103736)
    * Withdrawal roots SSZification & `wei/gwei` conversion, see: 
        * https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/3078   
        * https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/354
        * https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/6325
    * [EIP-6049: Deprecate SELFDESTRUCT](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-6049)
* EOF updates
    * Cancun CFI ([context](https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/pull/676#issuecomment-1372529540)) 
* Announcements
    * https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/708
